entry.title: Hexo on GitHub
entry.content: Preparation GitHub: Register New repo: FireCuckoo.github.io Install Git,Node.js Use Git Bash Settings for GitHub12345678cd c:cd Users/FireCuckoomkdir MyGitcd Mygitgit initgit config --global user.name "FireCuckoo"git config --global user.email "FireCuckoo@gmail.com"ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "FireCuckoo@gmail.com" add C:\Users\FireCuckoo.ssh\id_rsa.pub to GitHub Settings for hexoInit hexo1234567cd /c/Users/FireCuckoo/mkdir hexocd hexonpm install hexo-cli -ghexo inithexo ghexo s open URL: http://localhost:4000 Connect to GitHubopen ~/hexo/_config.yml Ctrl F Search “deploy” 1234deploy: type: git repository: git@github.com:FireCuckoo/FireCuckoo.github.io.git branch: master Git bash: 12npm install hexo-deployer-git --savehexo d Make it looks bettervisit http://theme-next.iissnan.com/ to use next theme more features;Use Search Engine, key word “hexo 美化”. Connect GitHub to your domain nameLocal SettingsNew filechange directory to ~/hexo/source new a file named CNAME, write in FireCuckoo.com, save. Git Bashopen Git Bashping FireCuckoo.github.iocopy the ip address DNS SettingsGo your domain name service:add recordCNAME WWW FireCuckoo.github.ioA @ 151.101.197.147 First PostGit Bash:hexo new "Hexo on GitHub"File Explorer:~/hexo/source/_postschange the content of "Hexo on GitHub"save.Git Bash:123hexo cleanhexo ghexo d Browser:http://www.FireCuckoo.com ALL DONE
